document_data.name: Wurt Dumire
document_data.mainbody:
'''Wurt Dumire''' was a tyrant ruling the [[goblin]] realm of the [[Kingdom of Nix]] in the [[Utter East]] during the time of the [[Bloodforge Wars]] ([[648 DR|648]]â€“[[657 DR]]).

In the aftermath of [[Redfang|Redfang the Reaper]]'s reign, Wurt Dumire came to enslave the goblins of Nix, putting them to work in a far-off mine. The leader of the [[Legendary Campaign]] felt unexpected sympathy for the goblins' plight and was compelled to try to bring an end to Wurt's operation in a [[bloodforge]] battle in Nix itself.
